home.title: César Alberca
home.heroTitle:
Digital Nomad.

Frontend Architect.

International Speaker.
home.whoAmI:
**Senior Frontend Architect** & **Software Crafter** from Spain. Freelancer _obsessed_ with **best practices**, **architecture** and **testing**.

As an [international speaker](https://www.cesalberca.com/talks) and Digital Nomad, I share my tech adventures around the world.

 Active in the [Codemotion](https://www.codemotion.com/) community as a committee member and [ambassador](https://community-en.codemotion.it/community/ambassador-program).

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: I love to create projects to learn new technologies and to share knowledge. Here are some of the projects I've created.
projects.katasDescription:
TDD and testing are very important to me. Whenever I was teaching a course about programming I needed to create the same exercises over and over again. So I decided to create this instead.

It's a project to practise TDD, testing and TypeScript through simple and useful Katas.
projects.blogDescription: I write about software architecture, testing and frontend development. I also write about my experiences as a Digital Nomad and my trips around the world.
projects.archimedesJsDescription: Archimedes is a series of architectural concepts that are implemented in different languages. Using a given Archimedes implementation provides a set of solid and flexible architectural pieces.

freelancer.title: Freelancer
freelancer.description: Branding, client outreach, project management, and development of frontend applications for multiple clients.

autentia.title: Autentia
autentia.description:
* __Front-end Architect Lead__. I designed and implemented Design Systems in different frameworks, modular architectures following Hexagonal and Domain Driven Design principles and created robust Testing Strategies.
* Software developer of different stacks, including JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Vue and React.
* Open Source developer: Created an [architectural framework](https://www.archimedesfw.io/docs/js/) in TypeScript that makes your application more robust.
* Trainer in different technologies, such as: JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue, Angular, React, testing, CSS, architecture, good practices and more.
* Onboarding: I was part of designing the frontend onboarding process in the company
* Mentor: I’ve been a mentor for the most junior members of the company and had 1:1 where we would set goals and track them.
* Interviewer: I interviewed prominent tech people for the [company’s YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iThFgLmD96E&list=PLKxa4AIfm4pVyeMpU0QkV4gzaFDaa_RFW&index=10)

codemotion.title: Codemotion Committee Member
codemotion.description: Help contact speakers and design the event agenda. Participate in different webinars about different technologies.

cice.title: Full Stack Development Masters Teacher at CICE
cice.description: Designed the curriculum, teach the students, and evaluate their progress. I taught HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, NextJS, testing, architecture, good practices, and more. Here you can check the [open curriculum](https://github.com/cice-classroom/cice-playground).

escuelaIt.title: Frontend Development Teacher at EscuelaIT
escuelaIt.description: Trainer for the following courses: [Deno](https://escuela.it/cursos/curso-de-deno), [TypeScript](https://escuela.it/cursos/curso-typescript), [React](https://escuela.it/cursos/curso-desarrollo-aplicaciones-spa-react) and [Advanced JavaScript](https://escuela.it/cursos/curso-avanzado-javascript).

pensemos.title: Pensemos
pensemos.description: Web developer with Wordpress and React.

comercialTalk.title: Comercial Talk
comercialTalk.description: Graphic designer and web developer. Poster, flyers, business cards and visual identity.

services.title: Services
services.description: I have 10 years of experience in Frontend Development. I've deployed to production full-fledged enterprise applications using React, Angular and Vue.
services.consultancyDescription: I can provide consultancy in different formats, from code reviews to architecture design. I specialise in greenfield projects, setting up the right architecture and best practices from the beginning.
services.trainingDescription: I will help you refine your team's skills in best practices, testing and architecture. I can provide training in different formats, from workshops to online courses.
services.developmentDescription: I can develop your project from scratch, from the architecture to the deployment. I specialise in frontend development, but I can also provide frontend full-stack development.

contact.title: Contact
contact.name: Name
contact.messageDescription: Want to work together? Have an idea you want to share? Just want to say hi?

about.title: About me
about.description:
I’m a self-learning, creative, enthusiast and passionate person. I have a mixed profile, divided between my love for programming, software architecture and design. I truly care about sharing knowledge with my peers, that being as a speaker in different technological events, as a teacher or throughout my social networks.

I believe that Software should be robust yet flexible, and the way to achieve it is to –regardless of the framework– create the right abstractions and apply architectural patterns. Testing is very important to me, the Software we build should be reliable in order to provide the maximum value.
